pr_title: Add continuous compaction in level compaction strategy

timeline.message: add continuous compaction in level compaction strategy

timeline.bodyText: this might mean during a merge process, another merge can be processed... why this method is needed
timeline.author: EJTTianYu

replies.bodyText: and this recursion might have no termination conditions...
replies.author: EJTTianYu

replies.bodyText: we want this effect because we want to start a new compaction task after one compaction task ends
replies.author: zhanglingzhe0820

timeline.message: update continuous compaction to new compaction task

timeline.bodyText: this comment needs to be modified
timeline.author: EJTTianYu

timeline.bodyText: the other comment in this file all use the format /** */, it is better to keep the same
timeline.author: EJTTianYu

timeline.bodyText: remove the field as the field is never used in this file
timeline.author: EJTTianYu

timeline.bodyText: I wonder this comment is correct as the boolean variable means whether current SG is merging
timeline.author: EJTTianYu

timeline.bodyText: this if-else could be removed as during the whole process, CompactionMergeTaskPoolManager is never Terminated
timeline.author: EJTTianYu

replies.bodyText: When IoTDB is closing it can be terminated, and we should not keep compaction
replies.author: zhanglingzhe0820

timeline.bodyText:
NUM_BYTES_OBJECT_REF is not equal to the object header size, you should use the NUM_BYTES_OBJECT_HEADER field in RamUsageEstimator.
And by the way, jvm may also align the object, so this calculation may not be exact.
timeline.author: JackieTien97

timeline.bodyText: Why this field does not have a corresponding property in iotdb-engine.properties.
timeline.author: JackieTien97
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -421,6 +427,11 @@
    */
   private long allocateMemoryForChunkCache = allocateMemoryForRead / 10;
 
+  /**
+   * Memory allocated for file statistics cache in compaction process
+   */
+  private long allocateMemoryForFileStatisticsCache = allocateMemoryForRead / 100;

timeline.bodyText: There is no need to calculate FileStatistics size each time, because it's a constant value
timeline.author: JackieTien97

timeline.bodyText: This will cause differernt thread read from disk repeatedly
timeline.author: JackieTien97

timeline.bodyText: It's better to add this cache to MBeans monitor.
timeline.author: JackieTien97
